Room.Name: Wall Road West
Room.ShortDescription: You are on Wall Road West, just north of the village's west gate.
Room.LongDescription: On the east side is a run-down little business called the Wayfarer's Rest. Travelers stop there on their way in and out of the city. It's always best to start a journey in the morning hours. The roads are trecherous during the night-time, as many of the creatures who prey on travelers do not like the heat of the sun.
